query:
UPDATE games
        SET completion = CASE
            WHEN NOT EXISTS (
                SELECT 1
                FROM roms
                WHERE roms.game_id = games.id
                AND roms.romfile_id IS NULL
                AND roms.parent_id IS NULL
            ) THEN 2
            WHEN NOT EXISTS (
                SELECT 1
                FROM roms
                WHERE roms.game_id = games.id
                AND roms.romfile_id IS NOT NULL
                AND roms.parent_id IS NULL
            ) THEN 0
            ELSE 1
        END
        WHERE system_id = ?
